scripts.name: FBX Importer (experimental)
scripts.author: Javi Agenjo
scripts.description: Allows to import FBXs by sending the file to the server.

scripts.name: SpriteSheet
scripts.author: Javi Agenjo
scripts.description: Allows to create sprite sheets from an animated 3D model.

scripts.name: Deployer
scripts.author: Javi Agenjo
scripts.description: Allows to sync a project with a remote server, useful to publish your project somewhere else.
